item.description:
Regina Pizza @ Station Landing

This bar/restaurant is just around the corner from the Wellington Station (Orange Line). It's just between Kelly's Roastbeef and Starbucks While I've been there several times for lunch, I've never made it to the wine tastings or entertainment evenings. It looks like a great time for a Wednesday night. Let's go!

The wine tasting is 6-9pm and the Accapella group begins at 6:30pm. I will be there just before 6pm and I'll tell the hostess where to find me so please meet at the hostess stand and ask for Amy's Group.

See ya soon!

~Amy
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Amy's group @ the hostess stand
item.name: Wine Tasting & North Shore Accapella
